title: ingredient
description: canonical description of a single ingredient, all quantities normalized against one unit of ingredient, whatever that unit may be

type.description: type field to identify objects in code

hash.description: Hashed key for the object from a canonical form

id.description: Permanent ID for an ingredient gestalt

allergens.description: Allergen categories this ingredient belongs to.

category.description: Grocery store categories this ingredient belongs to.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: unit object which contains any unit that may be used to refer to a specific ingredient

singular.description: The most commonly used singular unit used to describe the ingredient, leave this and plural blank if ingredient uses 'name' verbiage

plural.description: The most commonly used plural unit used to describe the ingredient

verbiage.description: How a name behaves grammatically: name -> 2 potatoes, specific -> 1 clove of garlic, SI -> 1L of milk

quantityClass.description: What type of physics unit - mass, volume, etc.

conversionFactorTo.description: conversion factors from the default unit to other classes

cooking.description: Smallest usable unit for a given ingredient.

portion.description: Unit scale fit for roughly one person for one meal.

storage.description: The amount that comes from an average grocery store purchase.

bulk.description: The amount that comes from an average costco purchase.
